import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import classNames from 'classnames' import { money } from 'utils' import { calculateChange } from '../utils' import Caption from './Caption' const { CaptionTitle, CaptionStatus, CaptionIcon } = Caption const ICONS = { down: 'arrow-down-bold warning', up: 'arrow-up-bold success', hold: 'ray-vertex info', not: 'block-helper warning' } const Table = ({ data, lastPeriod, currentPeriod, type }) => { return ( {data.map((item, index) => { const currentIndex = index + 1 const change = calculateChange(currentIndex, item.lastPosition) return ( {item.lastPosition ? ( ) : ( )} ) })}

) } Table.propTypes = { data: PropTypes.arrayOf( PropTypes.shape({ clientId: PropTypes.number, legalName: PropTypes.string, currentTotalCents: PropTypes.number, lastPosition: PropTypes.number, lastTotalCents: PropTypes.number }) ).isRequired, lastPeriod: PropTypes.string, currentPeriod: PropTypes.string, type: PropTypes.string } export default Table
